  labels = {["static"]}>
Create an instruction stream that represents a single iteration and stage of each instruction.

This function differs from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf">SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule</a> in that this doesn&#39;t have any side-effect to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a>. That is, this function is an approximation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf">SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule</a> with all non-const operations removed.

<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An implementation of the Swing Modulo Scheduling (SMS) software pipeliner.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This SMS implementation is a target-independent back-end pass. When enabled,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the pass runs just prior to the register allocation pass, while the machine</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IR is in SSA form. If software pipelining is successful, then the original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop is replaced by the optimized loop. The optimized loop contains one or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more prolog blocks, the pipelined kernel, and one or more epilog blocks. If</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the instructions cannot be scheduled in a given MII, we increase the MII by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one and try again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The SMS implementation is an extension of the ScheduleDAGInstrs class. We</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// represent loop carried dependences in the DAG as order edges to the Phi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nodes. We also perform several passes over the DAG to eliminate unnecessary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edges that inhibit the ability to pipeline. The implementation uses the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DFAPacketizer class to compute the minimum initiation interval and the check</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where an instruction may be inserted in the pipelined schedule.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In order for the SMS pass to work, several target specific hooks need to be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implemented to get information about the loop structure and to rewrite</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if the loop can be software pipelined.  The algorithm is</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function records the functional units needed by instructions that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iterations and check the register pressure at the point where all stages</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// overlapping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An example of unrolled loop where #Stage is 4..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iter   i+0 i+1 i+2 i+3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ------------------------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stage   0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stage   1   0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stage   2   1   0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stage   3   2   1   0  &lt;- All stages overlap</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal">  computeMaxSetPressure(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OrderedInstsTy &amp;OrderedInsts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">                        Instr2StageTy &amp;Stages,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">RegSetTy = SmallDenseSet&lt;Register, 16&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// manage the liveness of the registers independently by iterations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Calculate the resource constrained minimum initiation interval for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><Highlight kind="comment">/// specified loop. We use the DFA to model the resources needed for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><Highlight kind="comment">/// each instruction, and we ignore dependences. A different DFA is created</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for each cycle that is required. When adding a new instruction, we attempt</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to add it to each existing DFA, until a legal space is found. If the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instruction cannot be reserved in an existing DFA, we create a new one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::calculateResMII() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;calculateResMII:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><Highlight kind="normal">  ResourceManager <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64/#a2a1421dcee7067c8a9c69752bd8ec566ae435ab4c104cb9e9e78f43e41b8c02cb">RM</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a5a3d3d075a208011a24a0918b58d7daa">MF</a>.getSubtarget(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64/#a2a1421dcee7067c8a9c69752bd8ec566ae435ab4c104cb9e9e78f43e41b8c02cb">RM</a>.calculateResMII();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Calculate the recurrence-constrainted minimum initiation interval.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Iterate over each circuit.  Compute the delay(c) and distance(c)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for each circuit. The II needs to satisfy the inequality</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><Highlight kind="comment">/// delay(c) - II&#42;distance(c) &lt;= 0 For each circuit, choose the smallest</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><Highlight kind="comment">/// II that satisfies the inequality, and the RecMII is the maximum</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of those values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::calculateRecMII(NodeSetType &amp;NodeSets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecMII = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeSet &amp;Nodes : NodeSets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Nodes.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Delay = Nodes.getLatency();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Distance = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ii = ceil(delay / distance)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurMII = (Delay + Distance - 1) / Distance;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes.setRecMII(CurMII);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurMII &gt; RecMII)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">      RecMII = CurMII;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecMII;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create the adjacency structure of the nodes in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::Circuits::createAdjacencyStructure(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitVector <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a2f63e339cd88f5a8e97a8150ea9129d2af29ddbfb905eb2593fdcdfb243f9af85">Added</a>(SUnits.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><Highlight kind="normal">  DenseMap&lt;int, int&gt; OutputDeps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = SUnits.size(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a2f63e339cd88f5a8e97a8150ea9129d2af29ddbfb905eb2593fdcdfb243f9af85">Added</a>.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add any successor to the adjacency matrix and exclude duplicates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;OE : DAG-&gt;DDG-&gt;getOutEdges(&amp;SUnits&#91;i&#93;)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only create a back-edge on the first and last nodes of a dependence</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain. This records any chains and adds them later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OE.isOutputDep()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = OE.getDst()-&gt;NodeNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BackEdge = i;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Dep = OutputDeps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(BackEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Dep != OutputDeps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><Highlight kind="normal">          BackEdge = Dep-&gt;second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><Highlight kind="normal">          OutputDeps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a1eb8504bab5f794778d82db6ac829923">erase</a>(Dep);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><Highlight kind="normal">        OutputDeps&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>&#93; = BackEdge;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not process a boundary node, an artificial node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OE.getDst()-&gt;isBoundaryNode() || OE.isArtificial())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This code is retained o preserve previous behavior and prevent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// regression. This condition means that anti-dependnecies within an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration are ignored when searching circuits. Therefore it&#39;s natural</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to consider this dependence as well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Remove this code if it doesn&#39;t have significant impact on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OE.isAntiDep())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the adjacency structure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal">    Cir.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">    Cir.circuit(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, NodeSets, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create artificial dependencies between the source of COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is loop-carried to the USE in next iteration. This will help pipeliner avoid</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// additional copies that are needed across iterations. An artificial dependence</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// edge is added from USE to SOURCE of COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHI-------Anti-Dep-----&gt; COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE (loop-carried)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SRCOfCopY------True-Dep---&gt; COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHI-------True-Dep------&gt; USEOfPhi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The mutation creates</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// USEOfPHI -------Artificial-Dep---&gt; SRCOfCopy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This overall will ensure, the USEOfPHI is scheduled before SRCOfCopy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (since USE is a predecessor), implies, the COPY/ REG&#95;SEQUENCE is scheduled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// late  to avoid additional copies across iterations. The possible scheduling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order would be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// USEOfPHI --- SRCOfCopy---  COPY/REG&#95;SEQUENCE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::CopyToPhiMutation::apply(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs/#a5bcb745a3e78c329d1431608b1f51c25">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute the Succ&#95;L(O) set, as defined in the paper. The set is defined</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if the existing node-sets are profitable. If not, then ignore the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><Highlight kind="comment">/// recurrent node-sets, and attempt to schedule all nodes together. This is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a heuristic. If the MII is large and all the recurrent node-sets are small,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then it&#39;s best to try to schedule all instructions together instead of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2088"><Highlight kind="comment">/// starting with the recurrent node-sets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2089"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::checkNodeSets(NodeSetType &amp;NodeSets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2090"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for loops with a large MII.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2091"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MII &lt; 17)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2092"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2093"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the node-set contains only a simple add recurrence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2094"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;NS : NodeSets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2095"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NS.getRecMII() &gt; 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2096"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2097"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NS.getMaxDepth() &gt; MII)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2098"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2099"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Add the nodes that do not belong to a recurrence set into groups</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="comment">/// based upon connected components.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::groupRemainingNodes(NodeSetType &amp;NodeSets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">  SetVector&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt; NodesAdded;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallPtrSet&lt;SUnit &#42;, 8&gt; Visited;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the nodes that are on a path between the previous node sets and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Process the nodes in the computed order and create the pipelined schedule</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the instructions, if possible. Return true if a schedule is found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::schedulePipeline(SMSchedule &amp;Schedule) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeOrder.empty())&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;NodeOrder is empty! abort scheduling\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> );</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2426"><Highlight kind="normal">      SUnit &#42;SU = &#42;NI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the schedule time for the instruction, which is based</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// upon the scheduled time for any predecessors/successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EarlyStart = INT&#95;MIN;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LateStart = INT&#95;MAX;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><Highlight kind="normal">      Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#acfd4efd1c9f1a0174bd6f3942238c51b">computeStart</a>(SU, &amp;EarlyStart, &amp;LateStart, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Inst (&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a3f708b119627541f144d703a1d183202">NodeNum</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;) &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><Highlight kind="normal">        SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#accc60d2019e9dff57bb0918a94422ebb">dump</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2438"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2439"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">format</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\tes: %8x ls: %8x\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, EarlyStart, LateStart));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EarlyStart &gt; LateStart)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><Highlight kind="normal">        scheduleFound = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EarlyStart != INT&#95;MIN &amp;&amp; LateStart == INT&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><Highlight kind="normal">        scheduleFound =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><Highlight kind="normal">            Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">insert</a>(SU, EarlyStart, EarlyStart + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EarlyStart == INT&#95;MIN &amp;&amp; LateStart != INT&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><Highlight kind="normal">        scheduleFound =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><Highlight kind="normal">            Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">insert</a>(SU, LateStart, LateStart - (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> + 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EarlyStart != INT&#95;MIN &amp;&amp; LateStart != INT&#95;MAX) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><Highlight kind="normal">        LateStart = std::min(LateStart, EarlyStart + (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When scheduling a Phi it is better to start at the late cycle and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// go backwards. The default order may insert the Phi too far away</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from its first dependence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Also, do backward search when all scheduled predecessors are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop-carried output/order dependencies. Empirically, there are also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cases where scheduling becomes possible with backward search.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><Highlight kind="normal">            Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a4dbd10ef0657470e3bd9f6fb48cf2307">onlyHasLoopCarriedOutputOrOrderPreds</a>(SU, this-&gt;getDDG()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><Highlight kind="normal">          scheduleFound = Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">insert</a>(SU, LateStart, EarlyStart, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><Highlight kind="normal">          scheduleFound = Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">insert</a>(SU, EarlyStart, LateStart, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstCycle = Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aa9cf7f8bcf9a31775f99c732ad69e907">getFirstCycle</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal">        scheduleFound = Schedule.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">insert</a>(SU, FirstCycle + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a39271d8f98026cdac8a9fa7b8e90b333">getASAP</a>(SU),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        FirstCycle + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a39271d8f98026cdac8a9fa7b8e90b333">getASAP</a>(SU) + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Even if we find a schedule, make sure the schedule doesn&#39;t exceed the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allowable number of stages. We keep trying if this happens.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (scheduleFound)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#aa52e4697ac2f28af2390eead4614c1d1">SwpMaxStages</a> &gt; -1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="normal">          scheduleFound = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!scheduleFound)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (++NI != NE &amp;&amp; scheduleFound);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a schedule is found, ensure non-pipelined instructions are in stage 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (scheduleFound)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><Highlight kind="normal">      scheduleFound =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2486"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2487"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a schedule is found, check if it is a valid schedule too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to schedule the node at the specified StartCycle and continue</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"><Highlight kind="comment">/// until the node is schedule or the EndCycle is reached.  This function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2771"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returns true if the node is scheduled.  This routine may search either</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"><Highlight kind="comment">/// forward or backward for a place to insert the instruction based upon</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the relative values of StartCycle and EndCycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a2eff58d9105525f19d5cbe2fa6969d6e">SMSchedule::insert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StartCycle, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EndCycle, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2775"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> forward = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2776"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2777"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Trying to insert node between &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; StartCycle &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; and &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2778"><Highlight kind="normal">           &lt;&lt; EndCycle &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; II: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2779"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"><Highlight kind="normal">    forward = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2782"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2783"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The terminating condition depends on the direction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2784"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> termCycle = forward ? EndCycle + 1 : EndCycle - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> curCycle = StartCycle; curCycle != termCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2788"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ST.getInstrInfo()-&gt;isZeroCost(SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2804"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2807"><Highlight kind="normal">      SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#accc60d2019e9dff57bb0918a94422ebb">dump</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If an instruction has a use that spans multiple iterations, then</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute the scheduling start slot for the instruction.  The start slot</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2874"><Highlight kind="comment">/// depends on any predecessor or successor nodes scheduled already.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2875" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#acfd4efd1c9f1a0174bd6f3942238c51b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#acfd4efd1c9f1a0174bd6f3942238c51b">SMSchedule::computeStart</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;MaxEarlyStart, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;MinLateStart,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2876"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg">SwingSchedulerDDG</a> &#42;DDG = DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a461d411e76e02e7a4ec0ca56098540aa">getDDG</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over each instruction that has been scheduled already.  The start</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// slot computation depends on whether the previously scheduled instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is a predecessor or successor of the specified instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aa9cf7f8bcf9a31775f99c732ad69e907">getFirstCycle</a>(); cycle &lt;= LastCycle; ++cycle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a9d33c5d7d0efea61cb68e2ce82f693ce">getInstructions</a>(cycle)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;IE : DDG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg/#ac155300b317b84aef98c8f6b5381c193">getInEdges</a>(SU)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IE.getSrc() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Add reverse edge to &#96;DDG&#96; instead of calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;isLoopCarriedDep&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a78e274f7aa81fdeddac470d645c3c6e8">isLoopCarriedDep</a>(IE)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> End = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a326b69bb87197af5c7e9398da090d754">earliestCycleInChain</a>(IE, DDG) + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2892"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EarlyStart = cycle + IE.getLatency() - IE.getDistance() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2893"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#42;MaxEarlyStart = std::max(&#42;MaxEarlyStart, EarlyStart);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2894"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2895"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2896"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2897"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;OE : DDG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerddg/#afbd6cd25113b672fb9e9ec1339355d82">getOutEdges</a>(SU)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OE.getDst() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Add reverse edge to &#96;DDG&#96; instead of calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;isLoopCarriedDep&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a78e274f7aa81fdeddac470d645c3c6e8">isLoopCarriedDep</a>(OE)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Start = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#ae7d28b348c77e17419b65d3f3d7d55a4">latestCycleInChain</a>(OE, DDG) + 1 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#42;MaxEarlyStart = std::max(&#42;MaxEarlyStart, Start);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LateStart = cycle - OE.getLatency() + OE.getDistance() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2906"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#42;MinLateStart = std::min(&#42;MinLateStart, LateStart);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2907"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3021"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A circular dependence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OrderAfterDef &amp;&amp; OrderBeforeUse &amp;&amp; MoveUse == MoveDef)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3023"><Highlight kind="normal">    OrderBeforeUse = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3024"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3025"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OrderAfterDef takes precedences over OrderBeforeDef. The latter is due</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3026"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to a loop-carried dependence.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3027"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OrderBeforeDef)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3028"><Highlight kind="normal">    OrderBeforeUse = !OrderAfterDef || (MoveUse &gt; MoveDef);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3030"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The uncommon case when the instruction order needs to be updated because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is both a use and def.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3032"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OrderBeforeUse &amp;&amp; OrderAfterDef) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3033"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;UseSU = Insts.at(MoveUse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3034"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;DefSU = Insts.at(MoveDef);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3035"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MoveUse &gt; MoveDef) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3036"><Highlight kind="normal">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveUse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3037"><Highlight kind="normal">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveDef);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3038"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3039"><Highlight kind="normal">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveDef);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3040"><Highlight kind="normal">      Insts.erase(Insts.begin() + MoveUse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3041"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3042"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, UseSU, Insts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3043"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, SU, Insts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3044"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a70c8219e8d9627e2373f281be45f96ae">orderDependence</a>(SSD, DefSU, Insts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3045"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3046"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3047"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Put the new instruction first if there is a use in the list. Otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3048"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// put it at the end of the list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3049"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OrderBeforeUse)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3050"><Highlight kind="normal">    Insts.push&#95;front(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3051"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3052"><Highlight kind="normal">    Insts.push&#95;back(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3053"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if the generated schedule is valid. This function checks if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an instruction that uses a physical register is scheduled in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different stage than the definition. The pipeliner does not handle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// physical register values that may cross a basic block boundary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3191"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Furthermore, if a physical def/use pair is assigned to the same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case should be considered invalid.  (The test checks for both</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3214"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A property of the node order in swing-modulo-scheduling is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that for nodes outside circuits the following holds:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><Highlight kind="comment">/// none of them is scheduled after both a successor and a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219"><Highlight kind="comment">/// predecessor.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3220"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The method below checks whether the property is met.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3221"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If not, debug information is printed and statistics information updated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that we do not use an assert statement.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The reason is that although an invalid node order may prevent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3224"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the pipeliner from finding a pipelined schedule for arbitrary II,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it does not lead to the generation of incorrect code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SwingSchedulerDAG::checkValidNodeOrder(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeSetType &amp;Circuits)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a sorted vector that maps each SUnit to its index in the NodeOrder</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;SUnit &#42;, unsigned&gt; UnitIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3230"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;UnitIndex&gt; Indices(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a31669aae44fa7e6414dd5cd81e2b16f8">NodeOrder</a>.size(), std::make&#95;pair(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, 0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, s = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a31669aae44fa7e6414dd5cd81e2b16f8">NodeOrder</a>.size(); i &lt; s; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3233"><Highlight kind="normal">    Indices.push&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a31669aae44fa7e6414dd5cd81e2b16f8">NodeOrder</a>&#91;i&#93;, i));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CompareKey = &#91;&#93;(UnitIndex i1, UnitIndex i2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::get&lt;0&gt;(i1) &lt; std::get&lt;0&gt;(i2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3237"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3238"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sort, so that we can perform a binary search</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3240"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(Indices, CompareKey);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Valid = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3243"><Highlight kind="normal">  (void)Valid;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for each SUnit in the NodeOrder, check whether</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it appears after both a successor and a predecessor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the SUnit. If this is the case, and the SUnit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is not part of circuit, then the NodeOrder is not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, s = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a31669aae44fa7e6414dd5cd81e2b16f8">NodeOrder</a>.size(); i &lt; s; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
