<Link id="l03310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3310"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3312"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Attempt to fix the degenerate cases when the instruction serialization</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3313"><Highlight kind="comment">/// causes the register lifetimes to overlap. For example,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3314"><Highlight kind="comment">///   p&#39; = store&#95;pi(p, b)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3315"><Highlight kind="comment">///      = load p, offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3316"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In this case p and p&#39; overlap, which means that two registers are needed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3317"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instead, this function changes the load to use p&#39; and updates the offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3318" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a51bda1806219d879123625c8d4ae3fbc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag/#a51bda1806219d879123625c8d4ae3fbc">SwingSchedulerDAG::fixupRegisterOverlaps</a>(std::deque&lt;SUnit &#42;&gt; &amp;Instrs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OverlapReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewBaseReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU : Instrs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3322"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3323"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getNumOperands(); i &lt; e; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3324"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3325"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for an instruction that uses p. The instruction occurs in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3326"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// same cycle but occurs later in the serialized order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3327"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a69544ec8658eadeed98245dc37c3a541">isUse</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == OverlapReg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3328"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that the instruction appears in the InstrChanges structure,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3329"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which contains instructions that can have the offset updated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3330"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SUnit &#42;, std::pair&lt;unsigned, int64&#95;t&gt;</a>&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iplist">::iterator</a> It =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3331"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstrChanges.find(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3332"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (It != InstrChanges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3333"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BasePos, OffsetPos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3334"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the base register and adjust the offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3335"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a348590624c488b04d0f9e227e6c3960e">TII</a>-&gt;getBaseAndOffsetPosition(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, BasePos, OffsetPos)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3336"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;NewMI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a5a3d3d075a208011a24a0918b58d7daa">MF</a>.CloneMachineInstr(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3337"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(BasePos).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a682ba82f42f7903d0000ffbb13ea3b57">setReg</a>(NewBaseReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3338"><Highlight kind="normal">            int64&#95;t NewOffset =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3339"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(OffsetPos).getImm() - It-&gt;second.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3340"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(OffsetPos).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a2feaa1c69335c6b9028076cd68c7a5f5">setImm</a>(NewOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3341"><Highlight kind="normal">            SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a5a869f04a623443a4cf2d2857f9cd085">setInstr</a>(NewMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3342"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs/#a077eef2c61ca462db1800cc506092d38">MISUnitMap</a>&#91;NewMI&#93; = SU;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3343"><Highlight kind="normal">            NewMIs&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>&#93; = NewMI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3344"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3345"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3346"><Highlight kind="normal">        OverlapReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3347"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewBaseReg = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3348"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3349"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3350"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for an instruction of the form p&#39; = op(p), which uses and defines</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3351"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// two virtual registers that get allocated to the same physical register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3352"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TiedUseIdx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;isRegTiedToUseOperand(i, &amp;TiedUseIdx)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3354"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OverlapReg is p in the example above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3355"><Highlight kind="normal">        OverlapReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(TiedUseIdx).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3356"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NewBaseReg is p&#39; in the example above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3357"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewBaseReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(i).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3381"><Highlight kind="comment">/// After the schedule has been formed, call this function to combine</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3382"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the instructions from the different stages/cycles.  That is, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3383"><Highlight kind="comment">/// function creates a schedule that represents a single iteration.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3384" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aff7649124c08f77b72e5d539f2f8afdf">SMSchedule::finalizeSchedule</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &#42;SSD) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all instructions to the first stage from later stages.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#aa9cf7f8bcf9a31775f99c732ad69e907">getFirstCycle</a>(); cycle &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#af238533c2437443030e5fa4a710094c5">getFinalCycle</a>(); ++cycle) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3387"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> stage = 1, lastStage = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#a336ecf423257d7f3b529f5817d9598c9">getMaxStageCount</a>(); stage &lt;= lastStage;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3388"><Highlight kind="normal">         ++stage) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3390"><Highlight kind="normal">          ScheduledInstrs&#91;cycle + (stage &#42; InitiationInterval)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3391"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(cycleInstrs))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3392"><Highlight kind="normal">        ScheduledInstrs&#91;cycle&#93;.push&#95;front(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3394"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Erase all the elements in the later stages. Only one iteration should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// remain in the scheduled list, and it contains all the instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> cycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule/#af238533c2437443030e5fa4a710094c5">getFinalCycle</a>() + 1; cycle &lt;= LastCycle; ++cycle)</Highlight></CodeLine>
